summary: Build a marketing/e-commerce style website for a thepla brand with editable branding, brand story content, categorized product listings with sliders and realistic (unbranded) images, bottom navigation, FAQ, and contact details.

existing_features.title: Create a responsive multi-page website for a thepla brand with a clear home page narrative flow and dedicated pages/sections for Home, Categories, Cart, Notifications, Account, FAQ, and Contact.
Add an editable branding header area that leaves space for the user to set/replace the brand name and logo (including a visible placeholder when unset).
Add a "Brand Story" section on the Home page using the provided narrative text (verbatim, with appropriate paragraph formatting) and make it visually prominent.

Add a separate Home page section titled in English that explains how the brand supports/creates "Griha Mahila Udyog" (women working from home, financial independence), aligned with the intent of the user’s request and consistent with the story tone.

Implement a Categories page (and/or Categories section) that displays thepla products grouped into these categories with per-category slider/carousel browsing, showing product name, pack size, and price with the Indian Rupee symbol (₹): Long Duration (3 Months): Masala Thepla ₹40 (Piece of 4), Methi Thepla ₹45–₹50 (Piece of 4), Til Thepla ₹48 (Piece of 4); Short Duration (1 Day): Dudhi Thepla ₹60 (Piece of 4), Spinach Thepla ₹68 (Piece of 4); Diet Conscious: Multigrain Thepla ₹165 (Piece of 5), Bajra + Wheat Thepla ₹95 (Piece of 5), Nachani Thepla ₹128 (Piece of 5).

Add an "Other Products" section with a slider/carousel showing items with realistic unbranded images and ₹ pricing where provided. Include at minimum: Lime ₹95 (500g), Mango ₹110 (500g), and also list: Chilli (500g), Awla (500g), Carrot (500g), Chunda (500g), Thecha (500g). Quantity must be user-customizable per item (e.g., selectable/enterable quantity and/or weight), without requiring backend.

Implement basic cart functionality: users can add items from any slider to a Cart page, adjust quantities, and remove items. Cart should compute line totals and a grand total using ₹ and persist locally in the browser.
Add a bottom navigation bar visible on mobile (and optionally desktop) containing: Home, Categories, Cart, Notification, Account; each item must navigate to its respective page/route.
Create Notifications and Account pages as simple placeholders consistent with the site theme (no authentication required), so navigation destinations are complete and not broken.

Add an FAQ page with an FAQ accordion layout containing questions/answers relevant to the brand (shelf life, storage, ingredients/no preservatives, delivery/ordering, women-led production), written in English and consistent with the provided brand story.
Add a Contact page (or prominent Contact section) showing: Contact number 9785674345, Location Mulund East, and fields/placeholders for Email ID and Instagram handle (since values were not provided).

Use the Lijjat Papad website as a structural/reference inspiration (sections like legacy/story, women empowerment, quality/trust, product catalog, FAQ, contact) without copying brand names or copyrighted text; ensure this website includes the points requested in this prompt in a cohesive layout.

Establish a cohesive visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) appropriate for an Indian homemade food brand (warm, appetizing, traditional-modern blend) and apply it consistently across all pages; avoid blue/purple as primary colors.

Add the required generated product images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in product cards; images must be realistic and unbranded (no logos or brand text on packaging).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create website layout with editable logo and brand name placeholder areas
Add Brand Story section using provided narrative content
Add categorized thepla products (Long Duration/Short Duration/Diet Conscious) with ₹ pricing, pack-size labels, and per-category product slider views
Add 'Other products' section with slider, realistic unbranded images, ₹ pricing, and customizable quantity (e.g., 500g)
Add an additional story section about the brand’s Griha Mahila Udyog initiative
Add bottom navigation menu: Home, Categories, Cart, Notification, Account
Add Contact details section/page including phone (9785674345), location (Mulund East), email field, and Instagram handle field
Use Lijjat Papad website as reference for structure/content points to include

architectural_notes: Product images should be realistic stock-style photos with no brand/logo visible.
Brand name and logo should be editable (e.g., via config/CMS fields or clearly marked placeholders).
Use Indian Rupee symbol (₹) consistently in pricing display.
Product listings should support slider/carousel UI per category/section.
imageRequirements:

- Realistic unbranded photo of masala thepla stacked on a plate (thepla-masala.dim_1024x1024.png)
- Realistic unbranded photo of methi thepla stacked on a plate (thepla-methi.dim_1024x1024.png)

- Realistic unbranded photo of mango pickle in a plain glass jar (pickle-mango.dim_1024x1024.png)
- Realistic unbranded photo of red chilli pickle in a plain glass jar (pickle-chilli.dim_1024x1024.png)
